name: WOOD-PUSSY
notes:
Donald B. Abbott commissioned Philip L. Rhodes to design a small boat that would be suitable both as a junior trainer and as a day-sailer for adults. The hull has seen service as a sloop in at least two known instances. The PUFFIN was sailed in New England waters and the LAUDERDALE ONE-DESIGN in Florida (USA).
Fiberglass construction adopted by the mid 1950's.
Rhodes Design #491
